author: Shiv Sunny
text:
Four days of probe, scanning footage of 17 CCTV cameras, leads to the arrest

A language translator and the visual description of a turban have helped police identify two autorickshaw driver brothers who allegedly molested a Nigerian woman before pushing her off the running vehicle on Friday.

Four days of intense probe involving footage of 17 CCTV cameras, has led to the arrest of a 46-year-old autorickshaw driver even as his brother continues to abscond.

The 22-year-old Nigerian woman, pursuing her second year graduation from a Delhi University college in West Delhi, was out to visit her friend’s home around 1.30 a.m. on Friday when she was molested.
title: Auto driver held for molesting Nigerian
